column1: Apart from a moderately elevated Gamma-GT, normal liver enzymes where "moderately elevated Gamma-GT"  is a (Finding) and "moderately elevated" is a (Severity Qualifier) and "Gamma-GT" is (Substance); "normal liver enzymes" is a (Finding) and "normal" is a (Severity Qualifier) and "liver enzymes" is (Substance)

Marked increase in alkaline phosphatase and severe leukocytosis, alongside normal liver function tests where "increase in alkaline phosphatase" is a (Finding) and "increase" a (Severity Qualifier) and "alkaline phosphatase" a (Substance);  "severe leukocytosis" is (Finding) and "severe" a (Severity Qualifier); "normal liver function tests" is (Finding) and "normal" is (Severity Qualifier)

Elevated blood glucose levels, showing signs of possible diabetes, with normal hemoglobin A1c where "elevated blood glucose levels" is a (Finding) and "elevated" a (Severity Qualifier); "possible diabetes" is a (Finding) and "possible" a (Contextual Qualifier); "normal hemoglobin A1c" a (Finding) and "normal" a (Severity Qualifier) and "hemoglobin A1c" a (Substance)

Notably, there was a moderately increased bilirubin level, yet all other liver enzymes were normal where "moderately increased bilirubin level" is (Finding) and "moderately increased" a (Severity Qualifier); "normal liver enzymes" a (Finding) and "normal" a (Severity Qualifier) and "liver enzymes" is (Substance)
